AND EXECVDEMP_NM LIKE '%' || #{execvdempNm} || '%'
AND CPRT_CMP_IDFY_NO LIKE '%' || #{cprtCmpIdfyNo} || '%'
AND REG_DT >= TO_DATE(#{regStaDt},'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_DATE(#{regEndDt},'YYYYMMDD') + 1 > REG_DT
